title: H2OData_Dive
description: A machine learning-based Flask web app that predicts water potability based on key water quality indicators. This project combines data analysis, model building (RandomForestClassifier)

title: RealEstatePriceForecast
description: This project focuses on predicting house prices in Bangalore using machine learning techniques. The goal is to build a model that accurately estimates property prices based on various features like location, square footage, number of bedrooms, and more.

title: SpotifyTrendsAnalyzer
description: SpotifyTrendsAnalyzer is a data analytics project focused on uncovering trends within Spotify music. Analyze artist popularity, track song trends, and explore metrics like danceability and energy. Now featuring an interactive Tableau dashboard, with data preprocessed using Python and SQL for optimized insights.

title: Placement-Insights-Unveiling-Trends-in-Student-Career-Trajectories
description: Analyzing student placement data at XYZ Campus to uncover trends and factors influencing career outcomes. Utilizing descriptive and predictive analytics techniques to provide insights for students, educators, and recruiters.

title: GDP-and-Economic-Comparison-Sri-Lanka-vs.-USA
description: In this project, I conducted a comprehensive analysis of population data using Python and various data analysis libraries. Leveraging pandas for data manipulation and seaborn for visualization, I explored demographic trends and patterns within the dataset. Through careful examination of population dynamics, including growth rates and etc

title: CreditCard_Fraud_Detection
description: FraudGuard is a machine learning model for detecting fraudulent credit card transactions using anonymized transaction data

title: Plant Disease Detection
description: A deep learning-based project for detecting plant diseases from leaf images using convolutional neural networks (CNNs).
